# @babel/plugin-transform-dotall-regex

> Compile regular expressions using the `s` (`dotAll`) flag to ES5.

## Install

Using npm:

```sh
npm install --save-dev @babel/plugin-transform-dotall-regex
```

or using yarn:

```sh
yarn add @babel/plugin-transform-dotall-regex --dev
```
